   let trainingRoutines = [
       {
           name: "martial arts",
           type: "combat",
       },
       {
           name: "marksmanship",
           type: "combat",
       },
       {
           name: "intelligence",
           type: "espionage",
       },
       {
           name: "investing",
           type: "finance",
       },
       {
           name: "strength",
           type: "combat",
       },
       {
           name: "cooking",
           type: "entertainment",
       },
       {
           name: "sting operations",
           type: "espionage",
       },
   ];
   
   function train(agent, exercises) {
       agent.skills = [];
       for (let i = 0; i < exercises.length && agent.skills.length < 4; i++) {
           if (
               exercises[i].type === "combat" ||
               exercises[i].type === "espionage"
           ) {
               agent.skills.push(exercises[i]);
           }
       }
   }
   
   // PROGRAM IS THE CODE NAME FOR AGENT SMIH (FROM THE PREVIOUS DOCUMENT)
   // program === { name: "Smith", role: "Agent", status: "ACTIVE" }
   
   train(program, trainingRoutines);
